definitions.definition: To clarify, to correct a misconception.

definitions.example: All of their symptoms cleared up after the mold was removed.

definitions.definition: (of skin or medical images) To become free of certain blemishes.
definitions.example: His lung X-rays cleared up after they moved to Arizona.

definitions.definition: Of stormy weather, to dissipate, to become calm.
To pot all of the remaining balls in a single turn.
